item.title: Predicting Customer Churn, Part 1: EDA, Feature Engineering
item.description: This is Part 1 of a 2 Part series of predicting Customer Churn. The first step to predicting customer churn for a product “X” is understanding who these customers are; specifically, what purchase behavior patterns tell their story? Quantifying customer purchase behavior patterns, is one of the approaches that answers the question, and feature engineering produces the quantification parameters to output 2 useful products: Product 1: Quantitative Segmentation of our customers: Who are they?
